text:
Braiko Petr (September 9, 1918 – April 7, 2018) was a Soviet soldier. He served during the Second World War. He gained the status of Hero of the Soviet Union. He took part in seven raids by the guerrilla brigade of Sydir Kovpak. He was awarded Hero of the Soviet Union.
Braiko died on April 7, 2018 in Moscow of complications from bronchopneumonia at the age of 99.
